Description:
Customers can connect M365 Copilot with Zendesk Tickets to triage and resolve customer issues with Copilot Connector.
GA date: December CY2025
Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): [Copilot Extensibility] Customers can connect M365 Copilot with Zendesk Tickets to triage and resolve customer issues with Copilot Connector
